title: The Mindsets That Define CEO Excellence
description: McKinsey & Company Senior Partners Scott Keller and Vik Malhotra discuss the six responsibilities of the CEO role and the associated mindsets that distinguish the best leaders from the rest.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: McKinsey & Company Senior Partners Scott Keller and Vik Malhotra discuss the six responsibilities of the CEO role and the associated mindsets that distinguish the best leaders from the rest.
